document_data.mainbody:
Arkhens Hoard was a variety of blended wine, produced in Sembia. It was exported as far as the Western Heartlands, the lands along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate, as of the late 15 century DR.
Arkhens Hoard was a middling quality blended wine. It had notable sweet jam and tabacco flavor notes.
